DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the efficacy of 3% Minoxidil lotion and 3% Minoxidil with 0.1% Finasteride lotion for 6 months in male pattern hair loss.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study of Minoxidil Lotion Versus Combined Minoxidil and Finasteride Lotion to Treat Male Pattern Hair Loss
DOC.criteria: male, age 1815 years androgenetic alopecia grade 3V to 5 ( NorwoodHamilton classification) use minoxidil in 6 months use finasteride in 12 months use ketoconazole, tar, selenium shampoo, topical tretinoin, topical steroid in 2 weeks seborrheic dermatitis or psoriasis on scalp history of allergy to minoxidil, finasteride
